name: Stickman: Fidget Spinner Rush
description: Run! Just run and collect fidget spinners! Avoid obstacles and bloody traps.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: 1.4+ GHz processor Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible GPU with 512 MB Video RAM Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
